text: Rumen Ivaylov Rumenov (; born 7 June 1993) is a Bulgarian footballer, currently playing as a midfielder for Arda Kardzhali. ==Career== Rumenov made his competitive first team debut for Litex Lovech against Pirin Blagoevgrad on 12 March 2011 as a substitute. ===Etar Veliko Tarnovo=== On 12 June 2017 he left CSKA Sofia to join the newly promoted to the Bulgarian First League team of Etar Veliko Tarnovo.
